con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="OCS_ExternalNotification_services_v1" targetNamespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_services/v1" xmlns:interfaces_v1_0="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces/v1_0" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_services/v1"> <wsdl:import namespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces/v1_0" location="OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces_v1_0.wsdl"/> <wsdl:binding name="ExternalNotificationManagementPort_v1_0_SOAPBinding" type="interfaces_v1_0:ExternalNotificationManagementPort_v1_0"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <!--externalNotification--> <wsdl:operation name="externalNotification"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:externalNotification" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--adjustmentExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="adjustmentExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:adjustmentExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--topupExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="topupExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:topupExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--boltonExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="boltonExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:boltonExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--cyclicActionExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="cyclicActionExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:cyclicActionExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--tariffChangeExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="tariffChangeExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:tariffChangeExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--homeZoneExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="homeZoneExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:homeZoneExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--promotionExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="promotionExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:promotionExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--qualityOfServiceExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="qualityOfServiceExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:qualityOfServiceExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--productExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="productExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:productExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--listExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="listExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:listExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--changeSubscriberExtNot--> <wsdl:operation name="changeSubscriberExtNot"> <soap:operation soapAction="interfaces_v1_0:changeSubscriberExtNot" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> message="interfaces_v1_0:OCSHeaderInfo" part="messageID" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--NOTE: The domain name "www.ericsson.com" used in soap addresses is a placeholder for the actual domain name where the server is to be deployed--> <wsdl:service name="ExternalNotification_services_v1"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ExternalNotificationManagementPort_v1_0_SOAPBinding" name="ExternalNotificationManagementService_v1_0"> <soap:address location="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/ExternalNotificationManagementService_v1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces/v1_0" xmlns="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces/v1_0" xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_interfaces/v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1" schemaLocation="OCS_ExternalNotification_types_v1_0.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" schemaLocation="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="OCSHeaderInfo"> <wsdl:part name="messageID" element="wsa:MessageID"/> </wsdl:message> <!--ExternalNotification--> <wsdl:message name="externalNotificationRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:externalNotificationRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="externalNotificationResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:externalNotificationResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--AdjustmentExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="adjustmentExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:adjustmentExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="adjustmentExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:adjustmentExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--TopupExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="topupExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:topupExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="topupExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:topupExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--BoltonExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="boltonExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:boltonExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="boltonExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:boltonExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--CyclicActionExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="cyclicActionExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:cyclicActionExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="cyclicActionExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:cyclicActionExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--TariffChange--> <wsdl:message name="tariffChangeExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:tariffChangeExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="tariffChangeExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:tariffChangeExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--HomeZoneExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="homeZoneExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:homeZoneExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="homeZoneExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:homeZoneExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--PromotionExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="promotionExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:promotionExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="promotionExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:promotionExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--QualityOfServiceExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="qualityOfServiceExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:qualityOfServiceExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="qualityOfServiceExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:qualityOfServiceExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--ProductExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="productExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:productExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="productExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:productExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--ListExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="listExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:listExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:listExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--ChangeSubscriberExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="changeSubscriberExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:changeSubscriberExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="changeSubscriberExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:changeSubscriberExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--WalletThresholdEventExtNot--> <wsdl:message name="walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="walletThresholdEventExtNotResponse-v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="types_v1_0:walletThresholdEventExtNotResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--##########--> <!--PORT-TYPES--> <!--##########--> <wsdl:portType name="ExternalNotificationManagementPort_v1_0"> <wsdl:operation name="externalNotification"> <wsdl:input message="externalNotificationRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="externalNotificationResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="adjustmentExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="adjustmentExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="adjustmentExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="topupExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="topupExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="topupExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="boltonExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="boltonExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="boltonExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="cyclicActionExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="cyclicActionExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="cyclicActionExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="tariffChangeExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="tariffChangeExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="tariffChangeExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="homeZoneExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="homeZoneExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="homeZoneExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="promotionExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="promotionExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="promotionExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="qualityOfServiceExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="qualityOfServiceExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="qualityOfServiceExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="productExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="productExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="productExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="listExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> message="changeSubscriberExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="walletThresholdEventExtNot"> <wsdl:input message="walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest-v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="walletThresholdEventExtNotResponse-v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <!--E.164--> <xsd:simpleType name="E164NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{1,15}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="e164Number" type="E164NumberType"/> <!--Network--> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0Â¬5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6Â¬9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9aÂ¬fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4Address" type="Ipv4AddressType"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ipv6Address" type="Ipv6AddressType"></xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="IpAddressType"/> <!--User name--> <xsd:element name="userName" type="xsd:string"/> <!--URI--> <xsd:element name="anyURI" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <!--Subscriber Identification--> <xsd:complexType name="SubscriberIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="e164Number"/> <xsd:element ref="userName"/> <xsd:element ref="anyURI"/> <xsd:element ref="ipAddress"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="subscriberId" type="SubscriberIdType"/> <!--UnitValueType--> <xsd:complexType name="UnitValueType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:long"> <xsd:attribute name="exponent" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--CurrencyCodeType--> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[a-zA-Z]{3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="currencyCode" type="CurrencyCodeType"/> <!--MonetaryType--> <xsd:complexType name="MonetaryType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="UnitValueType"> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="opCost" type="MonetaryType"/> <!--Account Life Cycle--> <xsd:element name="subscriberState" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subscriberSubState" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="LifeCycleStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="subscriberState"/> <xsd:element ref="subscriberSubState" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="lifeCycleStatus" type="LifeCycleStatusType"/> <!--Balances--> <xsd:element name="balance" type="MonetaryType"/> <!--Balance Adjustment--> <xsd:element name="balanceChange" type="MonetaryType"/> <!--Balance Wallet--> <xsd:element name="walletId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="walletExpirationDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <!--WalletInfoType--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletId"/> <xsd:element ref="balance"/> <xsd:element ref="balanceChange"/> <xsd:element ref="walletExpirationDate"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletInfo" type="WalletInfoType"/> <!--WalletThresholdType--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletThresholdType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletId"/> <xsd:element name="threshold" type="MonetaryType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletThreshold" type="WalletThresholdType"/> <!--NegativeBalances--> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceType" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="negativeBalance" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="NegativeBalanceInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceType"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalance"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceInfo" type="NegativeBalanceInfoType"/> <!--Start/End Dates--> <xsd:element name="startDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="endDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <!--TimePeriod--> <xsd:element name="referenceDay" type="xsd:gDay"/> <xsd:element name="duration" type="xsd:duration"/> <xsd:element name="recurrentDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:complexType name="TimePeriodType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="referenceDay"/> <xsd:element ref="duration"/> <xsd:element ref="recurrentDate"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="timePeriod" type="TimePeriodType"/> <!--Cyclic action--> <xsd:element name="cyclicCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="flagFirstCycle" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="flagLastCycle" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="firstCycleDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="nextCycleDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="endCurrentCycleDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="costNextCycle" type="MonetaryType"/> <!--CyclesInformationType--> <xsd:complexType name="CyclesInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cyclicCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="timePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="flagFirstCycle" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="flagLastCycle" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="firstCycleDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="nextCycleDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="endCurrentCycleDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="costNextCycle" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cyclesInformation" type="CyclesInformationType"/> <!--App Id--> <xsd:element name="appId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="reference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="AppInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="appId"/> <xsd:element ref="reference"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="appInfo" type="AppInfoType"/> <!--Wallet list--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletInfoListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletInfo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletInfoList" type="WalletInfoListType"/> <!--Negative Balance list--> <xsd:complexType name="NegativeBalanceInfoListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceInfo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceInfoList" type="NegativeBalanceInfoListType"/> <!--SubscriberRelatedInfoType--> <xsd:element name="tariffPlan" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="technologyCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="serviceProviderId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="nextRentCycleDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubscriberRelatedInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="subscriberId"/> <xsd:element ref="tariffPlan"/> <xsd:element ref="lifeCycleStatus"/> <xsd:element ref="technologyCode"/> <xsd:element ref="serviceProviderId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="nextRentCycleDate" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="subscriberRelatedInfo" type="SubscriberRelatedInfoType"/> <!--DiscountInfoType--> <xsd:element name="realCost" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:element name="discount" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DiscountInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="realCost"/> <xsd:element ref="discount"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="discountInfo" type="DiscountInfoType"/> <!--MonetaryInfoType--> <xsd:element name="netCost" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:element name="tax" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MonetaryInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="currencyCode"/> <xsd:element ref="opCost"/> <xsd:element ref="balance"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalance" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="netCost" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="tax" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="discountInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="monetaryInfo" type="MonetaryInfoType"/> <!--OperationCodeInfoType--> <xsd:element name="operationCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subOperationCode" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:complexType name="OperationInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="operationCode"/> <xsd:element ref="subOperationCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="operationInfo" type="OperationInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="opReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="opExecutionDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="productReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="userCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="promotionCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="flagOperationOrCancellation" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="cancelledOpReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="rejectionCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="rejectionDescription" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="OpResultInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="opReference" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element ref="opExecutionDate" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--AccOpResultInfoType--> <xsd:complexType name="AccOpResultInfoType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="OpResultInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="productReference" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="promotionCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="subscriberRelatedInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="monetaryInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="operationInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="flagOperationOrCancellation"/> <xsd:element ref="cancelledOpReference" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rejectionCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rejectionDescription" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="result" type="AccOpResultInfoType"/> <!--ActionCauseCode--> <xsd:element name="actionCauseCode" type="xsd:string"/> <!--ActionCause--> <!--##############--> <!--AdjustmentType--> <!--##############--> <xsd:complexType name="AdjustmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletInfoList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceInfoList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="sosTopUpCompensation" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="actionCauseCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="adjustment" type="AdjustmentType"/> <!--#####--> <!--Topup--> <!--#####--> <xsd:element name="nonChargedBalance" type="MonetaryType"/> <!--TopupWalletInfoType--> <xsd:complexType name="TopupWalletInfoType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="WalletInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="nonChargedBalance" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topupWalletInfo" type="TopupWalletInfoType"/> <!--ElectronicTopupType--> <xsd:element name="electronicTopupManager" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subDistribuitor" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="zone" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="ElectronicTopupType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="electronicTopupManager"/> <xsd:element ref="subDistribuitor"/> <xsd:element ref="zone"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="electronicTopup" type="ElectronicTopupType"/> <!--VoucherTopupType--> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="VoucherTopupType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="serialNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="voucherTopup" type="VoucherTopupType"/> <!--TopupType--> <xsd:element name="topUpType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="partialTopUpFlag" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:complexType name="TopupWalletInfoListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="topupWalletInfo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topupWalletInfoList" type="TopupWalletInfoListType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalTopupInfoType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="electronicTopup"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="additionalTopupInfo" type="AdditionalTopupInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TopupType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="topUpType"/> <xsd:element ref="topupWalletInfoList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceInfoList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="partialTopUpFlag" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="additionalTopupInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="voucherTopup" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topup" type="TopupType"/> <!--##########--> <!--BoltonType--> <!--##########--> <xsd:element name="boltonCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="boltonType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="BoltonIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="boltonCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="boltonType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="boltonIdentifier" type="BoltonIdentifierType"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="UnitValueType"/> <xsd:element name="longBOCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="boltonState" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="threshold" type="xsd:int"/> <!--BoltonType--> <xsd:complexType name="BoltonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="boltonIdentifier" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="startDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="endDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="longBOCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="boltonState" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="threshold" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="bolton" type="BoltonType"/> <!--SOSTopUpCompensation--> <xsd:element name="topUpAmountCompensated" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:element name="topUpAmountNotCompensated" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:element name="penaltyAmountCompensated" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:element name="penaltyAmountNotCompensated" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SOSTopUpCompensationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="topUpAmountCompensated"/> <xsd:element ref="topUpAmountNotCompensated"/> <xsd:element ref="penaltyAmountCompensated"/> <xsd:element ref="penaltyAmountNotCompensated"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sosTopUpCompensation" type="SOSTopUpCompensationType"/> <!--################--> <!--CyclesActionType--> <!--################--> <xsd:element name="previousStateCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="currentStateCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="reason" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="renewalType" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="renewalNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:complexType name="TimeCyclicType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cyclesInformation"/> <xsd:element ref="previousStateCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="currentStateCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="reason" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="timeCyclic" type="TimeCyclicType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UsageCyclicType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="renewalType"/> <xsd:element ref="renewalNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="usageCyclic" type="UsageCyclicType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CyclicActionType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="timeCyclic"/> <xsd:element ref="usageCyclic"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cyclicAction" type="CyclicActionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalCyclicActionInfoType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="bolton"/> <xsd:element name="topup"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="additionalCyclicActionInfo" type="AdditionalCyclicActionInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceActivation" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceBlockedStatus" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:complexType name="NegativeBalanceStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceActivation" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceBlockedStatus" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="negativeBalanceStatus" type="NegativeBalanceStatusType"/> <!--############--> <!--TariffChange--> <!--############--> <xsd:element name="oldTariff" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="TariffChangeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="oldTariff"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="tariffChange" type="TariffChangeType"/> <!--########--> <!--HomeZone--> <!--########--> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="locationNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="ListOfLocationNumbersType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="locationNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="listOfLocationNumbers" type="ListOfLocationNumbersType"/> <xsd:complexType name="HomeZoneType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="postalCode"/> <xsd:element ref="listOfLocationNumbers" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="homeZone" type="HomeZoneType"/> <!--############--> <!--PromotionType--> <!--############--> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:complexType name="EBCPromotionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="code"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="eBCPromotionType" type="EBCPromotionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PromotionType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="eBCPromotionType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="promotion" type="PromotionType"/> <!--################--> <!--QualityOfService--> <!--################--> <xsd:element name="eventId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="applicationId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="user_ip" type="IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="maxBPSup" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="maxBPSDown" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="appId_AF" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="sessionId_Gy" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="sessionId_Rx" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="QualityOfServiceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="eventId"/> <xsd:element ref="applicationId"/> <xsd:element ref="user_ip" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="maxBPSup" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="maxBPSDown" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="appId_AF"/> <xsd:element ref="sessionId_Gy" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="sessionId_Rx" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="qualityOfService" type="QualityOfServiceType"/> <!--#######--> <!--Product--> <!--#######--> <xsd:element name="productCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cyclicActionOpReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="rentAmount" type="MonetaryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CancelledProductListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="opReference" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cancelledProductList" type="CancelledProductListType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProvidedOpRefListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="opReference" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="providedOpRefList" type="ProvidedOpRefListType"/> <xsd:element name="firstNotProvidedOpRef" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProductType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="productCode"/> <xsd:element ref="startDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="endDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cancelledProductList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="providedOpRefList" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="firstNotProvidedOpRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cyclicActionOpReference" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rentAmount" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="product" type="ProductType"/> <!--############--> <!--Lists--> <!--############--> <xsd:element name="listCode" type="xsd:string"/> <!--#################--> <!--Change Subscriber--> <!--#################--> <xsd:complexType name="ChangeSubscriberType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="negativeBalanceStatus"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="changeSubscriber" type="ChangeSubscriberType"/> <!--#################--> <!--Wallet Threshold Event--> <!--#################--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletThresholdEventType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletThreshold"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletThresholdEvent" type="WalletThresholdEventType"/> <!--####################--> <!--ExternalNotification--> <!--####################--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="appInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="userCode"/> <xsd:element ref="result"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="externalNotificationRequest" type="ExternalNotificationRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="externalNotificationResponse" type="ExternalNotificationResponse"/> <!--################--> <!--AdjustmentExtNot--> <!--################--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="AdjustmentExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="adjustment"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="adjustmentExtNotRequest" type="AdjustmentExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="AdjustmentExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="adjustmentExtNotResponse" type="AdjustmentExtNotResponse"/> <!--###########--> <!--TopupExtNot--> <!--###########--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="TopupExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="topup"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topupExtNotRequest" type="TopupExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="TopupExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topupExtNotResponse" type="TopupExtNotResponse"/> <!--############--> <!--BoltonExtNot--> <!--############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="BoltonExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="bolton"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="boltonExtNotRequest" type="BoltonExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="BoltonExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="boltonExtNotResponse" type="BoltonExtNotResponse"/> <!--##################--> <!--CyclicActionExtNot--> <!--##################--> <xsd:element name="subscribeOpReference" type="xsd:string"/> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="CyclicActionExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="additionalCyclicActionInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cyclicAction"/> <xsd:element ref="subscribeOpReference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cyclicActionExtNotRequest" type="CyclicActionExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="CyclicActionExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cyclicActionExtNotResponse" type="CyclicActionExtNotResponse"/> <!--#################--> <!--TariffChangeExNot--> <!--#################--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="TariffChangeExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="tariffChange"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="tariffChangeExtNotRequest" type="TariffChangeExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="TariffChangeExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="tariffChangeExtNotResponse" type="TariffChangeExtNotResponse"/> <!--##############--> <!--HomeZoneExtNot--> <!--##############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="HomeZoneExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="homeZone"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="homeZoneExtNotRequest" type="HomeZoneExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="HomeZoneExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="homeZoneExtNotResponse" type="HomeZoneExtNotResponse"/> <!--###############--> <!--PromotionExtNot--> <!--###############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="PromotionExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="promotion"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="promotionExtNotRequest" type="PromotionExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="PromotionExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="promotionExtNotResponse" type="PromotionExtNotResponse"/> <!--######################--> <!--QualityOfServiceExtNot--> <!--######################--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="QualityOfServiceExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="qualityOfService"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="qualityOfServiceExtNotRequest" type="QualityOfServiceExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="QualityOfServiceExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="qualityOfServiceExtNotResponse" type="QualityOfServiceExtNotResponse"/> <!--#############--> <!--ProductExtNot--> <!--#############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="ProductExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="product"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="productExtNotRequest" type="ProductExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="ProductExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="productExtNotResponse" type="ProductExtNotResponse"/> <!--#############--> <!--ListExtNot--> <!--#############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="ListExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="listCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="listExtNotRequest" type="ListExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="ListExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="listExtNotResponse" type="ListExtNotResponse"/> <!--#############--> <!--ChangeSubscriberExtNot--> <!--#############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="ChangeSubscriberExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="changeSubscriber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="changeSubscriberExtNotRequest" type="ChangeSubscriberExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="ChangeSubscriberExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="changeSubscriberExtNotResponse" type="ChangeSubscriberExtNotResponse"/> <!--#############--> <!--WalletThresholdEventExtNot--> <!--#############--> <!--Request--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletThresholdEventExtNotRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="walletThresholdEvent"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest" type="WalletThresholdEventExtNotRequest"/> <!--Response--> <xsd:complexType name="WalletThresholdEventExtNotResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="ExternalNotificationResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Future compatibility--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="walletThresholdEventExtNotResponse" type="WalletThresholdEventExtNotResponse"/> </xsd:schema>

Title to copyright in the WS-Addressing Specification will at all times remain with the Authors.
No other rights are granted by implication, estoppel or otherwise.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" elementFormDefault="qualified" blockDefault="#all" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"> <!--//////////////////// WS-Addressing ////////////////////--> <!--Endpoint reference--> <xs:element name="EndpointReference" type="wsa:EndpointReferenceType"/> <xs:complexType name="EndpointReferenceType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Address" type="wsa:AttributedURI"/> <xs:element name="ReferenceProperties" type="wsa:ReferencePropertiesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ReferenceParameters" type="wsa:ReferenceParametersType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="PortType" type="wsa:AttributedQName" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ServiceName" type="wsa:ServiceNameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If "Policy" elements from namespace "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy#policy" are used, they must appear first (before any extensibility elements).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:any> </xs:sequence> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReferencePropertiesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:any processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReferenceParametersType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:any processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceNameType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:QName"> <xs:attribute name="PortName" type="xs:NCName"/> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <!--Message information header blocks--> <xs:element name="MessageID" type="wsa:AttributedURI"/> <xs:element name="RelatesTo" type="wsa:Relationship"/> <xs:element name="To" type="wsa:AttributedURI"/> <xs:element name="Action" type="wsa:AttributedURI"/> <xs:element name="From" type="wsa:EndpointReferenceType"/> <xs:element name="ReplyTo" type="wsa:EndpointReferenceType"/> <xs:element name="FaultTo" type="wsa:EndpointReferenceType"/> <xs:complexType name="Relationship"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:attribute name="RelationshipType" type="xs:QName" use="optional"/> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="RelationshipTypeValues"> <xs:restriction base="xs:QName"> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:Reply"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--June 19, 2007: The ReplyAfter element is deprecated. The name of this element does not match the name (RetryAfter) used in the specification (http://www.w3.org/Submission/2004/SUBM-ws-addressing-20040810/).--> <xs:element name="ReplyAfter" type="wsa:ReplyAfterType"/> <xs:complexType name="ReplyAfterType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <!--June 19, 2007: The RetryAfter element has been added to be consistent with the specification (http://www.w3.org/Submission/2004/SUBM-ws-addressing-20040810/).--> <xs:element name="RetryAfter" type="wsa:RetryAfterType"/> <xs:complexType name="RetryAfterType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="FaultSubcodeValues"> <xs:restriction base="xs:QName"> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:InvalidMessageInformationHeader"/> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:MessageInformationHeaderRequired"/> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:DestinationUnreachable"/> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:ActionNotSupported"/> <xs:enumeration value="wsa:EndpointUnavailable"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:attribute name="Action" type="xs:anyURI"/> <!--Common declarations and definitions--> <xs:complexType name="AttributedQName"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:QName"> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AttributedURI"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
